title: Melisa Michelle Makeup Palette
description: Ulta is so excited to announce our collaboration with one of YouTube's hottest beauty vloggers, Melisa Michelle. Melisa curated a makeup palette that contains an assortment of shades specifically selected with every skintone in mind. Each of the shade names in the palette hold special meaning to Melisa and the palette contains a personal message for the guest on the back cover. The palette contains beautiful, rich and creamy powders and a matte liquid lipstick with staying power. Every detail of this palette was a partnership between Melisa and the brand.Click here to learn more about the Melisa Michelle Makeup Palette!Collection Includes:Highlighter Trio in Hollerrr (pearl highlighters in peachy pink, champagne and soft gold) (0.14 oz): When swirled, magic happens!; Blush in Mahal (matte rosy nude) (0.09 oz): This shade works with every look!; 5 Matte Eyeshadows (0.07 oz each):Bing Bing (matte burnt orange); Harley (matte chocolate); Weezy (light peachy matte); Rosemary (matte medium warm beige); Tobo (matte taupe); 4 Metallic Eyeshadows (0.07 oz each):Teresita (warm metallic gold); Kades (metallic copper); Alana (metallic plum); Lola (metallic vanilla); Matte Liquid Lipstick in Scandy (pink toned matte nude) (0.1 oz)

title: Lip Primer
description: The makeup artist's secret to longer lasting lip color! The unique formula of Ulta's Lip Primer helps smooth dry and textured lips creating the perfect canvas for comfortable, smooth and longer lasting lip color. Lip color stays vibrant and in place for hours without fading or bleeding. Paraben free. Sulfate free.

title: Eyeshadow Single
description: Ulta's Eyeshadow Singles have a super creamy, buttery texture with beautiful pigmentation and multiple finishes. Ulta's pressed powder eyeshadow formula is one-of-a-kind and comes packaged in an innovative component that allows you to remove the pan and insert into a customizable palette with ease!Benefits:Natural butters extracted from aloe and coconut oil allow the formula to 'melt' at skin temperature and adhere to lid preventing flaking or caking; Non-drying, rich, color payoff that nourishes the sensitive eye area; Smooth, creamy feel upon application with a long-lasting, cushiony after-feel; Paraben free; Mineral oil free; Gluten freeCreate your own Customizable Eyeshadow Palette. (Up to an $80 value!) CLICK HEREFollow these steps to customize your Palette:STEP 1: Choose either an Empty 4 Pan Palette or an Empty 8 Pan Palette to your shopping bag.; STEP 2: Make it yours. Choose from 36 shades of Ulta Eyeshadow. Add either 4 or 8 shades to your shopping bag.; STEP 3: Enjoy your palette! Discount will be applied at checkout.Please note: You must add either the 4 pan palette or 8 pan palette and the Ulta Eyeshadow to your bag. Each item will display separately with the original price when added to your bag. When everything is in your bag, the discount will display above your order total.

title: Powder Brush
description: The Ulta Powder Brush is made of feather tipped synthetic hairs that evenly apply both loose and pressed powder. Use Ulta Brush & Sponge Cleaner to regularly clean your brushes.

title: Automatic Eyeliner
description: Smooth, deep colors glide on effortlessly from the automatic tip of this Ulta Automatic Eyeliner. Color is long-lasting and waterproof, for dramatic, attention-getting eyes. No sharpening is required. Gluten free.

title: Full Coverage Liquid Concealer
description: Ulta's Full Coverage Liquid Concealer is a re-formulated concealer for a natural finish - perfect for dark eye circles or any imperfections. This light and creamy, full coverage liquid concealer contains special ingredients known to promote healing, concealing imperfections, and evening skin tone. Built with a waterproof formula and matte finish, this long lasting concealer is also excellent for concealing redness, scars and minor, non-puncture wounds on the face and body.Benefits:Aloe vera, chamomile green tea, and tea tree oil are natural ingredients that help heal and reduce redness and inflammation all while preventing infection when concealing; Formulated as gluten free, paraben free, sulfate free, and fragrance free; Suitable for all skin types; Full coverage, matte finish; Vegan-friendly

title: Demi Matte Foundation
description: Ulta's Demi Matte Foundation is a luxurious and lightweight cream gel formula that absorbs oil and prevents shine. title: Fabulous Face Foundation Primer
description: Ulta's Fabulous Face Foundation Primer is formulated to reduce the appearance of pores, fine lines and wrinkles creating the perfect base for foundation application. This formula also extends the wear of your foundation for a flawless look all day long. Vegan-friendly.

title: Japanese Eyelash Curler
description: The choice of professional makeup artists for luscious sweeping lashes, this premium Ulta Japanese Eyelash Curler is unsurpassed in quality and performance. This skillfully crafted beauty tool features meticulous alignment, a durable structure and super-soft silicone pads that hug each and every lash for incredible lift and curl. The contoured handles and expertly angled head ensure a perfect finger fit for superb control and precise positioning against the lash line.

title: Liquid Liner

Decadent color, enduring resilience, and a creamy smooth application make this liquid liner rise above the rest. Create endless looks with super saturated mattes, vibrant pearls and multi-faceted glitter shades. Use alone or layer to create unique looks. Oil free. Fragrance free. Gluten free. Paraben free. Sulfate free.

title: Large Z Palette
description: Ulta and Z Palette teamed up to create an exclusive open magnetic makeup palette with a clear window and a slim and sleek profile. Perfect for travel, as well as customizing and organizing makeup while de-cluttering your beauty counter.Features:Use for traveling or to view your assortment in one place; Remove eyeshadow pans, blushes, powders, bronzers - even lipsticks and concealers using the included instruction guide; Use the complimentary metal stickers to magnetize non-metal pans instantly, and then place your favorite shades in the Z Palette for a completely customized and interchangeable palette that's ready for any occasion; Includes: 20 round and square metal stickers; Can fit up to 28 Ulta Eyeshadow Singles (4 rows of 7 eyeshadows)(Dimensions: 7.44" x 4.13" x 0.25")
